name: IMAGINE
description:
The visuals extract from the unconscious mind, to create art devoid of logical comprehension. Seek into channel this unconscious to unlock the power of imagination.

The process to unlock ideas and images from the unconscious minds, from depict dream worlds or hidden psychological tensions, and sometimes from Indigenous art and knowledges as a way of imagining alternative realities.

"Imagine all the people, sharing all the world,
Anything is possible with an 'open mind',
Just open your mind and imagination and creativity will flourish – ideas realised".

Through the imageries that were just mentioned,
we can easily derive the next characteristic of Surrealism - Dreams & Fantasies. 

PNG | 3000x3750 px
Visual Art by Lucidity25
